product_name: Feedback Sports Velo Hinge Bike Storage Rack
long_description: A simple but clever hook mount that folds up when not in use, the Velo Hinge from Feedback Sports offers an affordable, innovative way to store your bike. Hinged design allows bike to swing to the right or left to create more space in cramped storage areas. Wheel bumper stabilizes bike and prevents swaying. Powder-coated steel; 50 lb. load capacity.
short_description: A simple but clever hook mount that folds up when not in use, the Velo Hinge from Feedback Sports offers an affordable, innovative way to store your bike.
